programme.title: The Mummy Returns
programme.desc: Acht jaar zijn er inmiddels verstreken sinds Rick O'Connell en Egypte-deskundige Evelyn vochten voor hun leven tegen Imhotep, The Mummy. Het stel is inmiddels getrouwd en heeft een zoon Alex. Evelyn werkt nu in het British Museum, waar Imhotep toevallig weer herrijst. Zelfs na drieduizend jaar houdt hij nog steeds van zijn oude liefde Anck-Su-Numan en wil hij samen met haar het eeuwige leven delen. Tijdens zijn zoektocht naar onsterfelijkheid, ontvoert hij Alex. Evelyn en Rick gaan wanhopig achter hun zoon aan en moeten het dit keer ook opnemen tegen een nog machtiger strijder, The King of Scorpions. Ze willen niet alleen hun zoon terugvinden, maar ze moeten ook de hele wereld redden van haar ondergang. Kijkwijzer: Let op met kinderen tot 12 jaar, programma bevat geweld en angst.(n)

programme.title: Death in Paradise
programme.desc: Britse detectiveserie over de Londense inspecteur Richard Poole, die zeer tegen zijn zin naar een paradijselijke eiland in de Caraïben moet om de moord op een Britse agent te onderzoeken. Kijkwijzer: Let op met kinderen tot 12 jaar, programma bevat geweld, angst en grof taalgebruik.(n)

programme.title: Death in Paradise
programme.desc: Britse detectiveserie over de Londense inspecteur Richard Poole, die zeer tegen zijn zin op een paradijselijk eiland in de Caraïben de misdaad moet helpen bestrijden. DI Poole vindt langzaamaan zijn draai in Saint-Marie, maar elke dag heeft nog wel een uitdaging voor hem in petto. Wanneer de eigenaar van een voormalige suikerplantage dood wordt aangetroffen met een machete in zijn rug, staan Richard en zijn team voor een bijna onoplosbare zaak. Hoewel er genoeg verdachten zijn, hebben ze allemaal een sluitend alibi. En velen van hen waren bij elkaar op het ogenblik van de moord. Het is als het zoeken naar een speld in een hooiberg, maar het liefdesfestival Erzulie lijkt het onverwachte in iedereen naar boven te brengen. Kijkwijzer: Let op met kinderen tot 12 jaar, programma bevat geweld, angst en grof taalgebruik.(n)

programme.title: Death in Paradise
programme.desc: Britse detectiveserie over de Londense inspecteur Richard Poole, die zeer tegen zijn zin op een paradijselijk eiland in de Caraïben de misdaad moet helpen bestrijden. Een jonge non die dood wordt teruggevonden in haar slaapkamer vol rook brengt DI Richard Poole en zijn team snel ter plaatse. Wat eerst een onschuldig ongelukje met een sigaret lijkt, draait uit op een moordonderzoek. Maar hoe is dit misdrijf kunnen gebeuren aangezien haar deur langs binnen op slot was? Er is geen tekort aan verdachten, maar Richard moet wel zijn scepticisme en schijnbaar irrationele angst voor nonnen aan de kant zetten. Alleen zo kan hij deze zaak met zijn team tot op de bodem uitspitten. Kijkwijzer: Let op met kinderen tot 12 jaar, programma bevat geweld, angst en grof taalgebruik.(n)

programme.title: Jamie's Great Britain
programme.desc: Kookprogramma waarin Jamie Oliver doorheen Groot-Brittannië reist om uit te zoeken waarom Brits eten zo lekker is. Jamie trekt naar Zuid-Wales waar hij meer te weten komt over de impact van de Welshe kolenboom in de 19e eeuw op de Britse eetgewoonten. Italianen trokken massaal naar Zuid-Wales om er in de koolmijnen te werken voor ze zelf hun restaurants openden. Hij proeft er traditionele Italiaanse gerechten met Sandra en Franco Tambini zoals porcinisaus en anolini. In Tiger Bay brengt hij een bezoek aan de lokale moskee en het buurtcentrum, hij proeft er gerechten uit Yemen met Samira Shaddad zoals pittige lamsbout, pannenkoeken en pittige dipsauzen.(n)

programme.desc: Deel 1.(n)

programme.title: De Vergeten Krijgers
programme.desc: De documentaire De Vergeten Krijgers belicht de onbekende geschiedenis van de Indo-Afrikaanse militairen die in de kolonie Nederlands-Indië voor 'Koningin, volk en vaderland' vochten. In de documentaire wordt de 94-jarige Daniël Cordus gevolgd, een kleinzoon van de Afrikaanse KNIL-soldaat Cordus. Onder deze Nederlandse achternaam werd stamvader Cordus in 1837 ingeschreven voor het KNIL in kasteel Elmina, Ghana. Honderd jaar later wordt tijdens de Tweede Wereldoorlog de pas 19-jarige Daniël Cordus samen met zijn twee broers als krijgsgevangenen aan de beruchte Birmaspoorweg tewerkgesteld door de Japanse bezetter. Daniël strijdt sinds zijn gedwongen komst naar Nederland voor eerherstel van alle Indo-Afrikanen die voor de Nederlandse vlag gestorven zijn. Zeventig jaar na zijn krijgsgevangenschap keert hij voor het eerst terug naar Birma om afscheid te nemen van zijn broer Jan die op het ereveld in Thanbyuzayat rust.(n)

programme.title: Het Verhaal van een Moeder
programme.desc: Denise Janzee probeert nader tot haar moeder Willeke van Ammelrooy te komen. Denise heeft haar beroemde moeder nog het beste leren kennen via haar filmrollen. Op de set en op het scherm zag ze haar moeder huilen, lachen en vechten. Thuis sloot Willeke zich echter af als ze verdriet had: 'Ik kom pas uit mijn holletje als ik weer lach. Zo sta ik in het leven.(n)

programme.title: In het Vuur van de Storm
programme.desc: Vera redt Émilie uit de klauwen van de NSB en zoekt haar op tegen de wil van Piet. Hans is ten einde raad als zijn langverwachte verlof wordt afgewezen. Berger heeft nog één plan om hem uit de hel van het oostfront te krijgen. Als het slaagt kan Hans terugkeren naar huis en voorgoed onderduiken, maar de prijs die Berger moet betalen is hoog. Kijkwijzer: Let op met kinderen tot 16 jaar, programma bevat geweld en grof taalgebruik.(n)

programme.title: Nederland Toen

Een film over Nederland in watersnood, met reddingsoperaties en inzamelacties en een overzicht van de scheepvaart door de jaren heen geven een mooi overzicht van de rol die water speelt in Nederland. Met een film over de totstandkoming van de Noordoostpolder is het thema compleet.(n)

programme.title: Jane Eyre
programme.desc: Na het mislukte huwelijk dwaalt Jane doelloos rond op de heide. Ze is uitgeput en uitgehongerd en geeft zich over aan de natuurelementen. Maar predikant St John Rivers en zijn twee zussen vinden haar en lappen haar langzaam maar zeker weer op. Jane onderdrukt al haar herinneringen aan Rochester en besluit een nieuw leven te beginnen. Op een wandeling op de heide ontmoet ze de prachtige en rijke Rosamond Oliver. Ze is duidelijk verliefd op St John en hij is verliefd op haar, maar St John weigert met haar te trouwen omdat hij het belangrijker vindt om zijn roeping als missionaris te volgen. Jane onderdrukt haar herinneringen aan haar eigen mislukte huwelijk en aanvaardt St Johns aanbod om directrice te worden van een nieuwe parochieschool voor arme meisjes. Zodra Jane besloten heeft dat ze zal blijven, wordt ze overspoeld door herinneringen. Kijkwijzer: Let op met kinderen tot 6 jaar, programma bevat geweld en angst.(n)

programme.title: Tommy Teleshopping
programme.desc: Vrije tijd.(n)

programme.title: En route avec Pleijsier
programme.desc: Acteur Sjoerd Pleijsier maakt samen met zijn beste vriend chef-kok én Fransman Jacques Rouet de ultieme roadtrip door Frankrijk. Met de herinneringen aan het verleden in hun gedachten rijden zij de Franse versie van de route 66: de beroemde N7. Ondertussen ontdekken zij langs deze befaamde route de heerlijkste wijnen, de lekkerste gerechten, bijzondere verhalen en culinaire geheimen. In de eerste aflevering van En route avec Pleijsier maken we kennis met acteur Sjoerd Pleijsier en chef-kok Jacques Rouet. Het duo vertrekt vanuit Amsterdam op weg naar de eerste stop: Dijon. In deze Franse stad maken zij kennis met de mosterd van monsieur Fallot, duiken zij een wijngaard in waar de beroemde Clos de Vougeot uit de Bourgogne geproduceerd wordt en bezoeken zij het Domaine de la Grand'Court in Fleurie waar biologische Beaujolais wordt gemaakt. De heren sluiten aflevering 1 af met de eerste editie van de Kircompetitie: een zoektocht naar de beste zelfgemaakte Kir.(n)

programme.title: Tommy Teleshopping
programme.desc: Vrije tijd.(n)

programme.title: Mijn Nostalgisch Nederland - Zuid-Limburg
programme.desc: In de serie Mijn Nostalgisch Nederland komt de recente geschiedenis van verschillende Nederlandse steden en streken aan bod. Zuid Limburg: Carnaval en koers. Staatsmijnen en Sint Rosafeesten. 'Mijn-Zuid Limburg' neemt u mee naar het verleden van deze streek.(n)

programme.desc: Vrije tijd.(n)

programme.title: On the Buses
programme.desc: Stan flierefluit door het EHBO-examen, maar hoe gaat hij om met een echt noodgeval?(n)

programme.title: La Piovra
programme.desc: Na de dood van politie inspecteur Corrade Cattani doet onderzoeksrechter Silvia Conti de belofte zijn moordenaars voor de rechtbank te slepen. In samenwerking met de politie in de VS, arresteert ze in New York een maffiabaas. Hij noemt de namen van twee bij de moord op Cattani betrokken mannen: Giovanni Linori en Antonio Espinosa. David Licata, de enige overlevende van een aanslag op een politieteam door Linori 15 jaar geleden, wordt door Inspecteur Simon Barth overgehaald te infiltreren in de Linori Clan. In de Siciliaanse villa van Linori komen mysteries uit het verleden en heden samen.(n)

programme.title: Mijlpalen in de 20e eeuw
programme.desc: 1960 tot 1969. Mijlpalen in de 20e eeuw is een indrukwekkend overzicht van de grote politieke intriges, oorlogen, medische revoluties, wetenschappelijke doorbraken en maatschappelijke onrust die de 20e eeuw hebben getekend. Aan de hand van bijzonder beeldmateriaal uit de archieven van Pathé en de BBC worden de voornaamste historische gebeurtenissen getoond. Documentairemaker Gary Tarpinian heeft met deze reeks een prachtige document neergezet over de 20e eeuw.(n)

programme.title: Een Bijzonder Jaar - 1970
programme.desc: De serie Een bijzonder jaar toont iedere aflevering de belangrijkste gebeurtenissen uit een bepaald jaar. 1970. Het jaar waarin Soekarno overlijdt en schaatser Ard Schenk wereldkampioen wordt. Deze en meer unieke momenten komen voorbij in dit bijzondere jaar.(n)

programme.title: Wordt u al geholpen?
programme.desc: Bij Grace Brothers verwachten ze koninklijk bezoek. Mr. Rumbold bereidt samen met zijn personeel het bezoek zo goed mogelijk voor.(n)

programme.title: Some Mothers Do 'Ave 'Em
programme.desc: Frank volgt een cursus houtbewerking, maar dat is vragen om problemen.(n)

programme.title: Gouden Amusement
programme.desc: Gouden Amusement is een serie vol topamusement uit de afgelopen decennia uit de theaters en van de tv. In Gouden Amusement geniet u onder meer van legendarische optredens van duos als Snip en Snap, Johnny en Rijk, de Mounties en Dorus.(n)

programme.title: Top 40 Hitdossier
programme.desc: Erik de Zwart presenteert in het programma Top 40 Hitdossier de leukste hits en clips uit de befaamde Top 40. In elke aflevering staat de Top 40 van een bijzondere datum uit de geschiedenis centraal. In deze aflevering: de top 40 van 21 juni 1979 met aandacht voor de introductie van de walkman.(n)

programme.title: Ons Tuintje
programme.desc: Ons Tuintje is een realityserie over de gezellige maar vooral ook actieve volkstuinvereniging 'Ons Genot' aan de rand van Utrecht. De meeste leden zijn erg trots op hun tuintje en zorgen er dan ook voor dat alles er keurig bij staat. Deze week mogen we een kijkje nemen in het tuintje van het enthousiaste tuinierstel Ben en Vera. Eén van de leden moet met pijn in zijn hart afstand doen van zijn tuintje en het bestuur organiseert een gezellige informatiebijeenkomst voor nieuwe leden.(n)

Daar bekent ze hem dat er nog een moord op de planning staat, die op haar ex-vriend Raymond. Wanneer Father Brown de man gaat opzoeken, blijkt dat hij op het punt staat Kimbleton te verlaten. programme.desc: Een bankbediende wordt dood aangetroffen in de kluis. Er blijkt ook geld verdwenen te zijn. Nog voor Witse zijn onderzoek kan starten, komt er een melding van een tweede overval, deze keer op een wedkantoor. Vreemd genoeg heeft de dader zichzelf laten filmen, zodat zijn identiteit makkelijk achterhaald kan worden. Speelt Simon De Wachter een roekeloos kat-en-muisspel? Witse gaat op onderzoek uit en ontdekt al snel dat de overvallen maar het topje van de ijsberg zijn. Kijkwijzer: Let op met kinderen tot 12 jaar, programma bevat geweld, angst en grof taalgebruik.(n)

programme.title: F.C. De Kampioenen
programme.desc: Om meer supporters te lokken willen de Kampioenen een Sinterklaasfeest organiseren. Een collega van Pol zal voor Sint spelen en snoep uitdelen langs het veld. Xavier moet tegen zijn zin Zwarte Piet zijn. Boma zal van de gelegenheid gebruik maken om promotie te maken voor z'n Boma- Light-worst. DDT hoort van de plannen en wil erbij zijn om reclame te maken voor zijn garage. Omdat hij niet mag meedoen, zegt hij de collega van Pol af, en besluit zichzelf uit te geven voor de Goede Sint om de Kampioenen het leven zuur te maken. Hij geniet van de situatie tot plots de echte Sinterklaas opdaagt. Kijkwijzer: Alle leeftijden.(n)

programme.title: Vera
programme.desc: In een rivier wordt het lichaam van een jongeman teruggevonden. Het lijk is zwaar toegetakeld. Vera Stanhope heeft er alle moeite mee om de identiteit van de man te achterhalen. Een tatoeage op het lichaam leidt Vera naar de onderwereld van Newcastle, waar het slachtoffer schijnbaar connecties had. Het onderzoek krijgt echter een geheel andere wending en leidt inspecteurs Vera en Aiden Healy naar een afgelegen boerderij, waar 13 jaar eerder een moord heeft plaatsgevonden. Kijkwijzer: Let op met kinderen tot 12 jaar.(n)

programme.title: Toto le héros
programme.desc: Thomas en Alfred zijn ongeveer dezelfde tijd geboren. Door een brand in het kraamcentrum zijn alle baby's door elkaar gehaald. Alfred heeft rijke ouders en Thomas raakt steeds meer ervan overtuigd dat ze vroeger verwisseld zijn. Hij geeft Alfred de schuld aan alles; zijn ongelukkigheid, de dood van zijn zus en zijn onvermogen om een relatie met Evelyn aan te gaan. Tegen het einde van zijn leven formuleert hij een wraakplan tegen Alfred; de man die zijn bestaan en leven gestolen heeft.(n)

Door het gebruik van het toverwoord 'Ssssh...' kan ze zich verplaatsen naar plekken waar een dier in nood is. Op deze manier helpt ze de dieren en dat zorgt vaak voor spannende avonturen. programme.title: Antboy en de wraak van de rode furie
programme.desc: Avonturenfilm van Ask Hasselbalch, naar de boeken van Kenneth Bogh Andersen. Nederlandstalige versie (orig.: 'Antboy - Den Rode Furies Havn') Antboy 's triomf over een gevaarlijke tegenstander, De Vlo, heeft hem razend populair gemaakt. De Vlo zit nu veilig opgesloten in de gevangenis. "Antboy" is de geheime identiteit van Pelle Noordmans, een doodgewone jongen van 13. Pelle heeft nu andere zorgen; een nieuwe jongen op school probeert zijn vriendin Ida in te palmen en een mysterieuze wraakgodin, de Rode Furie, maakt het Pelle erg lastig. Kijkwijzer: Let op met kinderen tot 6 jaar, programma bevat geweld en angst.(n)

programme.title: Junior Bake Off

It's Allegra's surprise recipe for 'squashed fly' scones, accompanied by homemade jam and cream. The bakers are relieved to discover that the 'squashed flies' are just currants and they will be more relieved if they can master the show-stopper ombre cake to win a place in the quarter-finals.(n)

programme.title: Millie Inbetween
programme.desc: Comedy drama series about modern family life. Mike tells a horrified Craig that he's planning to ask Mum to marry him. Craig joins forces with Lauren to prevent it - they know what happens when this goes wrong, and they don't want Mike and Mum rushing into another disaster. Despite their efforts to ruin the romantic atmosphere, Mike pops the question - and Mum says yes. Millie's the only one who thinks it'll be fine - but sees what they mean when she's asked out on a date herself. It upsets the happy status quo of her group of friends - and she falls out with Fran. Now she feels the same as Lauren and Craig about the wedding - but Mike is already making plans for the big day.(n)

programme.title: The Next Step
programme.desc: Reality-style drama following the lives of a group of dancers at the Next Step Dance Studio. Eldon challenges Hunter to win back the nationals solo award. Emily is forced to prove her loyalty to Amanda by ending something that is just starting. James searches for a four-leaf clover for Riley's list.(n)

programme.title: The Next Step
programme.desc: Reality-style drama following the lives of a group of dancers at the Next Step Dance Studio. Thalia, Giselle, and Amanda represent the Next Step at a trio competition. When Michelle comes to watch, Amanda is forced to change her plans. James tackles number ten on Riley's list and decides to get to know Emily.(n)

programme.title: The Next Step
programme.desc: Children's drama series following the lives of a group of teenage dancers as they compete in a national dance competition. James turns to the boys for help to solve a riddle for Riley. The A-Troupe costumes for nationals go missing. Emily's loyalties are tested.(n)

programme.title: The Next Step
programme.desc: Reality-style drama series following the lives of a group of dancers at the Next Step Dance Studio. James gets his driving licence for Riley. Michelle searches for something she loves as much as dance and joins the debate team at school. Amanda learns that Emily cannot be trusted.(n)

programme.title: The Next Step
programme.desc: Reality-style drama following the lives of a group of dancers at the Next Step Dance Studio. Emily tries to expose Amanda but gets caught in her own trap. Kate discovers the Next Step's money is missing and holds Chloe responsible. Riley enlists James to take CPR training for the studio with her.(n)

programme.title: The Next Step
programme.desc: Reality-style drama following the lives of a group of dancers at the Next Step Dance Studio. Amanda's true colours are exposed, and the results are devastating for the Next Step. Emily catches West doing a good deed. Riley enlists James to convince a studio ex-member to come back.(n)

programme.title: The Next Step
programme.desc: Reality-style drama following the lives of a group of dancers at the Next Step Dance Studio. Officially back together, Riley and James struggle to find their chemistry on the dance floor. Emily and West get to know each other better. Michelle gets a boost to her confidence from an old friend.(n)

programme.title: The Next Step
programme.desc: Reality-style drama following the lives of a group of dancers at the Next Step Dance Studio. Successful choreographer Luther Brown drops in on the Next Step to help the boys with their small group routine. Thalia and Giselle are in a rush to try to teach Michelle the nationals routine. James gives Eldon dating advice.(n)

programme.title: The Dumping Ground: I'm Floss
programme.desc: Dumping Ground characters gather to watch videos made by Ashdene Ridge residents about their lives there. Featuring a mixture of new scenes and classic moments from The Dumping Ground and Tracy Beaker Returns. This time it is Floss's turn.(n)

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: Did you know that the Victorians invented films? Not only that, but one of the first stars of the moving image was Queen Victoria! Using real footage recently restored by the BFI, this special show takes a Horribly Historical look at the Victorians' obsession with film. We see some of Queen Vicky's very first filmic appearances (also featuring an initially reluctant Tsar Nicholas I), and also how the Victorians became obsessed with filming everything, from their holidays abroad to strapping cameramen to the front of a moving train (using only ropes) to make 'Phantom Ride' films.Along the way we also meet the Lumiere brothers (one of whom looks a lot like First Dates' Fred Sirieix), Kaiser Wilhelm II, notable Victorian actor Herbert Beerbohm Tree, and we see that the Victorians were also early adopters of Fake News. The episode ends with a show-stopping song that traces the evolution of film from the Victorians' first forays through to the blockbusters we see in the multiplexes today.(n)

programme.title: The Dumping Ground
programme.desc: Drama series set in a children's home. Jay's plan to seize the day brings him face to face with the memories of his childhood.(n)

programme.title: OOglies Funsize
programme.desc: Stop-motion animation. Toast soldiers take to the skies in their toast-rack helicopter, Maki and Iso ambush a suspicious Nigiri in a ninja sushi attack, and intrepid star bar attempts an ambitious trip to the moon. Also, Frankfurter's monster comes to life in the back of the mouldy fridge and Stunt Tomato amazes the judges with a death-defying magic trick.(n)

programme.title: Danger Mouse
programme.sub-title: The Toad Who Would Be King
programme.desc: Animated series. Danger Mouse hunts for Baron von Greenback. He is nowhere to be found, but then what is this? The baron pops up on Penfold's favourite TV game show Who Wants to Marry a Queen. Danger Mouse is tasked with escorting the Queen of Goldlandia on her official visit to London with her new husband, the Baron. Colonel K orders DM to serve and protect the new King Greenback! Subjected to humiliation after humiliation at the hands of his former nemesis, DM takes his eye off the ball and the queen is kidnapped along with the baron's daughter Delilah. Both he and the baron naturally blame one another. An urgent call for help from Delilah leads to the baron and DM racing into a trap. Delilah has kidnapped the queen and now has both her father AND Danger Mouse on a sinking Toadlantis. Can DM thwart Delilah's thirst for power as she tries to crown herself the new Queen of Goldlandia? Kijkwijzer: Take care with children under 6.(n)

programme.title: OOglies
programme.desc: When the humans are away the OOglies play! The eccentric ensemble of household pranksters sprout eyes and clown around, embarking on a series of adventures that find them slipping, sliding and splatting onto television screens. The OOglies are up to more prankster playfulness as Boo Potato scares up some laughs, manly Monkey Wrench gets a girly makeover with a difference and the Battery Brothers take over a robot to zap the marauding monster known only as 9Volter!(n)

programme.title: Dennis & Gnasher Unleashed!
programme.desc: Animated series. Dennis and the gang train Bertie in the art of standing up to people so he can rebel against Walter's bossiness - but they train him too well and he becomes a dangerous rebel without a clue!(n)

programme.title: Odd Squad
programme.desc: The Odd Squad investigate strange events. In this two-part episode, the tube system breaks and Olive and Otto are left stranded in a dangerous forest.(n)

programme.title: Diddy TV
programme.desc: Diddy Dick Dom have their very own TV station. Shows include dancing diddies in The Diddy Step, music in Diddy Pops and a heartbreaking documentary about a boy with a spoon for a nose.(n)

programme.title: Newsround
programme.desc: Topical news magazine for children.(n)

programme.title: Step Up to the Plate
programme.desc: The Kitchen Crew cook up a storm with their tropical-themed menu.(n)

programme.title: The Dumping Ground
programme.sub-title: The Return of the Freaky Twins
programme.desc: Outraged to find her enemy, Ross, will be staying at the DG for a short while, Floss sets a path for revenge. May-Li's in the mist of a childcare crisis and has to bring baby Henry to Ashdene Ridge for the day. When Mike is accused of not being able to go a day without coffee, an open challenge is set for the YP to relinquish their vices for a day.(n)

programme.title: Matilda and the Ramsay Bunch
programme.sub-title: The Fresh Eggs of Bel Air
programme.desc: Setting up a chicken farm in their Bel Air back garden is the perfect way for Tilly to expand the Ramsay family and get super fresh eggs to cook with. Using her best powers of persuasion she gets mum Tana to agree and drafts in sister Holly to help. Travelling along the Californian coast to Malibu they meet up with expert urban farmer Helene Henderson, who gives them two of her beautiful chickens and advice on starting Tilly's farm. After settling the new Ramsays into their coop, Tilly makes lunch for her hungry farm workers, mum and holly: a show-stopping brooding hen cake, yummy eggy bread and a Cobb salad with a ranch dressing.(n)

programme.title: Class Dismissed
programme.desc: Following four Year 8 pupils as they grapple with everyday life at an extraordinary school. Dockbridge High is being inspected by Ofsted. Can the school pass with flying colours?(n)

programme.title: HH: Gory Games
programme.desc: Historical game show. Katya, Matt and Charlotte compete to win year spheres in a series of games, including Mummify Me and Gong Farming. Warning - this show contains gore, guts and gags.(n)

programme.title: Operation Ouch!
programme.desc: Dr Chris and Dr Xand show how incredible the human body is. The doctors test a new theory to see if they can find out why skin goes wrinkly in the bath, Dr Chris meets a patient taking part in groundbreaking heart research, and there is a test of the power of eyes. Meanwhile, there are more medical mysteries in Ouch & About, and over in accident and emergency one patient has a very sore head and another has dislocated her jaw.(n)

programme.title: Horrible Histories
programme.desc: Historical sketch show based on the successful books by Terry Deary. Robert Walpole struggles to talk to England's German king, a Scottish sportsman attacks dead cows in the Highland Games, American inventor Paul Revere demonstrates his gunpowder toothpaste and the Roman emperors channel the King of Pop in their musical argument over who's baddest of all.(n)

programme.title: Matilda and the Ramsay Bunch
programme.sub-title: The Fresh Eggs of Bel Air
programme.desc: Setting up a chicken farm in their Bel Air back garden is the perfect way for Tilly to expand the Ramsay family and get super fresh eggs to cook with. Using her best powers of persuasion she gets mum Tana to agree and drafts in sister Holly to help. Travelling along the Californian coast to Malibu they meet up with expert urban farmer Helene Henderson, who gives them two of her beautiful chickens and advice on starting Tilly's farm. After settling the new Ramsays into their coop, Tilly makes lunch for her hungry farm workers, mum and holly: a show-stopping brooding hen cake, yummy eggy bread and a Cobb salad with a ranch dressing.(n)

programme.title: Class Dismissed
programme.desc: Following four Year 8 pupils as they grapple with everyday life at an extraordinary school. Dockbridge High is being inspected by Ofsted. Can the school pass with flying colours?(n)

programme.title: The Dumping Ground
programme.sub-title: The Return of the Freaky Twins
programme.desc: Outraged to find her enemy, Ross, will be staying at the DG for a short while, Floss sets a path for revenge. May-Li's in the mist of a childcare crisis and has to bring baby Henry to Ashdene Ridge for the day. When Mike is accused of not being able to go a day without coffee, an open challenge is set for the YP to relinquish their vices for a day.(n)

programme.title: The Dumping Ground
programme.desc: Drama series. Things start disappearing on Carmen and Tee's last day at the Dumping Ground. Some of the residents decide to track down the thief - but they're not the ones who catch them.(n)

programme.title: Unsung Heroines: Danielle de Niese on the Lost World of Female Composers
programme.desc: Documentary which takes a look at five female composers - from the Middle Ages to the late 20th century - who were famous in their lifetimes, but whose work was then forgotten. Danielle de Niese explores the lives and works of Hildegard of Bingen, Francesca Caccini, Clara Schumann, Florence Price and Elizabeth Maconchy. These women all battled to fulfil their ambitions and overcome the obstacles that society placed in their way. They then disappeared into obscurity, and only some have found recognition again.(n)

programme.title: A Brief History of Graffiti
programme.desc: Dr Richard Clay goes in search of what it is that has made us scribble and scratch mementoes of our lives for more than 30,000 years. From the prehistoric cave paintings of Burgundy in France, through gladiatorial fan worship in Roman Lyons to the messages left on the walls of Germany's Reichstag in 1945 by triumphant Soviet troops, time and again we have wanted to leave a permanent record of our existence for our descendants. And it may be that this is where what today we call art comes from - the humble scratch, graffiti.(n)

programme.title: From Ice to Fire: The Incredible Science of Temperature
programme.desc: Three-part series in which Helen Czerski explores the science of temperature. Helen explores the narrow band of temperature that has led to life on Earth. She reveals how life began in a dramatic place where hot meets cold, and how every single living creature on Earth depends on temperature for its survival. She uncovers the extraordinary natural engineering that animals have evolved to keep their bodies at the right temperature. And she witnesses the remarkable surgery that's using temperature to push the human body to the very brink of life.(n)

programme.title: This is BBC Four
programme.desc: This is BBC Four. Programmes start at 7.00pm.(n)

programme.title: Show Me Show Me
programme.desc: Chris and Pui investigate and explore within their magical playroom in the sky, bringing objects and ideas to life. Stuffy is dressed as a stripy bee, so Chris and Pui take a look at real bees through the telescope, then buzz all around the playroom with the toys, collecting pollen to take back to their pretend hive. Then they look at knees and play a game of Teddington Says. Rapunzel trips over her hair in the cafe and bumps her knee, but Chris can't quite hear what she needs to feel better, so he gets her meal all wrong.(n)

programme.title: Twirlywoos
programme.desc: Stop-motion preschool programme about the adventures of four inquisitive Twirlywoos. The Twirlywoos learn about small things when they pursue a tiny butterfly around a butterfly house. Back on the boat, they are tickled by a mysterious creature who keeps getting smaller to avoid being caught.(n)

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Preschool series. The Teletubbies take selfies with the Tubby Phone and a child in Tummy Tales has their photo taken in a photo booth with their grandparent. Then it's time for a Tubby Phone Dance.(n)

programme.title: Raa Raa the Noisy Lion
programme.desc: Stop-frame animated series featuring Raa Raa and his friends, who solve very noisy mysteries in the Jingly Jangly Jungle. Raa Raa is sure he has found the perfect present for each of his friends, but some of his packages get mixed up.(n)

programme.title: Numberblocks
programme.desc: It's time for the grand finale but the number fun doesn't stop here: there's so much more to explore! Step into the wonderful wider world of numbers with the Numberblocks.(n)

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Children's animation. Bing and Flop are in the park when they see Pando on a skateboard. Bing is full of awe as he watches Pando skate up and down. He can't wait to have a go himself, but it's much harder to balance than Pando made it look. Bing falls off and bumps his knee, but Pando finds a clever way to help Bing get his confidence back.(n)

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Children's animation. Bing is at Amma's creche when a butterfly flies in and lands on Sula's painting. Bing tries to help the butterfly go back outside by picking it up, but he holds it too tightly and the poor butterfly is squished. Flop and Amma help the sad children say goodbye to the butterfly.(n)

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Animated preschool series. Duggee has something really interesting to show at the clubhouse. Can the Squirrels find some other interesting things to share?(n)

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Animated preschool series. Duggee is cleaning out his cupboard when he comes across Bucky, his old rocking horse. The Squirrels help Duggee to mend Bucky so he feels brand new again and in return they get to ride him.(n)

programme.title: Bitz and Bob
programme.desc: Animated preschool series introducing children to science and engineering. It's the day of the kite festival and first up are Zip and Pop, who dazzle the crowd with their performance. Then Bitz and Bob take to the arena, but their kites don't even get off the ground. Finally it's Bevel and Purl's turn, but Bevel tries kite-flying with no hands and loses them. Things take a turn for the worse when Zip grabs on to Pop's kite and gets swept away by the wind. Bitz and Bob have to work out how to get their kites to fly in order to rescue Zip. Kijkwijzer: All ages.(n)

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.sub-title: The Tale of the Tunnel Rumbler
programme.desc: Animated series. When Peter and his friends mistake the echoey 'rebbits' of a lost Jeremy Fisher for a scary monster, they set about ridding their tunnels of this mysterious invader. But with Tommy Brock on the warpath nearby, it will not be easy!(n)

programme.title: Go Jetters
programme.desc: Meet the Go Jetters, four explorers on a global adventure with their teacher Ubercorn - a disco-loving unicorn. When Grim HQ's heating gets stuck on, Glitch looks for a cold place to land and cool down. Meanwhile, the Go Jetters enjoy the cool sights of Harbin Ice City in China. Every year sculptors at the festival create realistic models of world-famous landmarks from blocks of ice, and Lars is attempting to carve the Eiffel Tower. Suddenly the sculptures around them begin to melt. The team investigates why everything is heating up and discovers a red hot Grim HQ sat in the middle of the festival. If they don't move it quickly, Harbin Ice City will melt!(n)

programme.title: Octonauts
programme.desc: Animated deep sea adventure series. Captain Barnacles and his intrepid band of explorers roam the oceans in search of adventure and fun. When two young leafy sea dragons are accidentally separated from their father and brought onboard the Octopod, the Octonauts must find them before they end up in Kwazii's stew.(n)

programme.title: Biggleton
programme.desc: Preschool series in which children pretend to be grown-ups in an imaginary town. Everyone's getting ready for Frankie the Business Woman's big party. Hairdresser Sam is giving Police Officer Liam and Professor Millie fancy hairdos, and Ava the Postie delivers a tower of parcels full of party treats to Frankie's house. Aleem the Baker has baked some chocolate chip cookies - will Frankie buy any of those for the party? But Frankie the Business Woman is busy on the phone. Ava overhears her saying she wants something to be flattened with a big roller. Ava tells everyone in the hairdressers that Frankie the Business Woman is going to flatten Biggleton. This is bad news and now nobody feels like partying. Instead they start marching to 'Save Biggleton'.(n)

programme.title: Justin's House
programme.desc: Justin Fletcher entertains a live audience of children with singing, dancing and comedy chaos. Robert invites supercool pop star Bustin Grooves to lunch, but no matter what they do, Bustin just won't sing. Guest starring Darren Hart.(n)

programme.title: Tee and Mo
programme.desc: Tee wants his bike to go faster so Mo suggests she remove the stabilizers. Tee needs some convincing.(n)

programme.title: Yakka Dee
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say 'egg' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see lots of different eggs - a brown egg, a white egg, we even see inside an egg. There's a dippy egg, a fried egg, an egg being laid and what will come out of the hatching egg? There's a gold egg, a cold egg and Dee and her friends even have an egg and spoon race!(n)

programme.title: Alphablocks
programme.desc: Educational fun. The adventures of 26 lively letters who can make words come to life by holding hands. T has such a tip-top time making words with his friends that he invites S to join him - and soon wishes he hadn't. If only he could start the whole day over again! This episode has fun with the 'st' blend and the words top, tub, tag, stop, stub, stag, lost and best.(n)

programme.title: Kit and Pup
programme.desc: Preschool series introducing children to scientific opposites and materials. Today Kit and Pup are out and about. Can you see who is going over the bridge and who is going under the bridge?(n)

programme.title: Bing
programme.desc: Children's animation. Bing wants to draw a big picture, so Flop finds him some chalk to draw on the pavement. Bing draws a fabulous stripy, spotty, zig-zag dinosaur, but just as he has finished, a rain shower washes the dinosaur away. Bing is devastated until he sees that a bit of dinosaur is left behind, and with that new beginning there is another chalk something waiting to be created.(n)

programme.title: Twirlywoos
programme.desc: Stop-motion preschool programme about the adventures of four inquisitive Twirlywoos. The Twirlywoos are hiding behind a garden wall, watching a man with a hosepipe. The man starts to wind the hosepipe in, making it shorter and shorter. The Twirlywoos decide they'd like to try making the hosepipe shorter too - much to the man's surprise. Back on the Big Red Boat, the Twirly Screen entertains with a line. When the line jumps off the screen, the Twirlywoos jump on it, but every time they do, it gets shorter and shorter.(n)

programme.title: Something Special
programme.desc: Using a sign language called Makaton, Something Special helps its audience learn how to communicate, as well as develop their language in a fun and exciting way. Justin and his friends get ready for a big dance performance at Blackpool Ballroom. Meanwhile, Mr Tumble is also in the mood for dancing and holds a dance competition with the toys.(n)

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Preschool series. When the lights go out in the Home Dome, the Teletubbies get the giggles! The lights come back on again and there is Tubby Custard mess everywhere.(n)

programme.title: The Baby Club
programme.desc: Giovanna and Baby Bear welcome babies Tobias, Inam, Isaac, Enya, Hawa, Jean and their grown-ups to The Baby Club. Parents, carers and their babies at home are invited to join in with all the fun activities too! Inside everyone's bags in this episode are shakers and rattles which are explored through discovery, play, song and story. Grown-ups at home are encouraged to take part by hiding baby appropriate shaker or rattle inside a fabric bag or pillowcase for them to reveal and explore with their baby! The fun song 'Dingle Dangle Scarecrow' features, as does a story involving Baby Bear. Plus, the Together Song gets everyone moving about, before some calm time with bubbles and the Goodbye Song.(n)

programme.title: Patchwork Pals
programme.desc: Preschool children's series about a group of animals that live together on a huge patchwork blanket. All the Patchwork Pals are sleeping deeply - except the Owl. But why is she awake at night?(n)

programme.title: Olobob Top
programme.desc: When Big Fish is sad that she can't go on a holibob with the Olobobs, they manage to bring their holiday to her - with the help of the Olobob Top!(n)

programme.title: Small Potatoes
programme.desc: Animated series about a group of potatoes who sing songs in different genres. Chip sings a heartfelt song about being a potato. Though he cannot do many physical things, he is proud of who he is.(n)

programme.title: Let's Play
programme.desc: Preschool show exploring the magic of play through dressing up, role play and pretending. Rebecca steps through the Magic Curtain to play firefighters. Can she save the day and put out the fire at the bakery, and will Carrotcake the parrot be safe?(n)

programme.title: Get Well Soon Hospital
programme.desc: Children's series. Dr Ranj and his puppet patients explore medical conditions at the hospital using music and humour. Visiting Dr Ranj at the hospital is Riz, who is having a chest x-ray to make sure his lungs are working properly. Riz is learning to play the recorder, so it is important for him to have plenty of puff! Dr Ranj explains how x-rays pass through Riz's body to take special photos that will show the inside of his chest.(n)

programme.title: My Pet and Me
programme.desc: Series showing children what it really means to have a pet. Rory visits a petting farm and meets up with Karim, Alex and Wiki to find out more. They meet Carol who works there, and together they clean out the miniature donkeys' stable. They have fun meeting lots of different animals at the farm.(n)

programme.title: My Petsaurus
programme.desc: Preschool series about a seven-year-old girl and her troublesome pet triceratops. Chloe and Topsy are playing a game of fetch in the park, or at least they're trying to, but Topsy doesn't seem to quite understand the rules.(n)

programme.title: Show Me Show Me
programme.desc: Children's programme. Momo goes for a ride in a hot-air balloon, and Chris and Pui make a giant patchwork picture.(n)

programme.title: My World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: Ryan's Vietnamese Pork and Prawn Cha
programme.desc: Preschool series celebrating foods from a rich diversity of backgrounds. Ryan's mum is Vietnamese and he is cooking a dish from Vietnam that she has taught him. He works hard in the kitchen mixing lots of ingredients together, including pork, prawns and fresh mint. He even finds time to teach us the Vietnamese word for egg! One of Ryan's ingredients is fresh mint, but not all of Ryan's friends like the taste or smell of it at first. Some of them even think it smells like toothpaste! Let's hope they like the taste of the fresh mint once it is cooked in the food. Ryan also decorates a beautiful Vietnamese style table and treats his friends to sweet fruit after the meal.(n)

programme.title: Waffle the Wonder Dog
programme.desc: Preschool comedy drama series about a family with a magical talking dog. The Brooklyn-Bells take Waffle round to Mrs Hobbs' house to show her what a good dog he's become. She's very impressed until she discovers Waffle has gone missing. Kijkwijzer: All ages.(n)

programme.title: What's the Big Idea?
programme.desc: Preschool animation exploring ideas and promoting thinking skills, encouraging viewers to make up their own minds. Hugo explores what art is by looking at all sorts of weird and wonderful paintings, sculptures and photos. And he learns that art can make you feel all kind of feelings!(n)

programme.title: Katie Morag
programme.sub-title: Katie Morag and the Two Peas
programme.desc: Live-action children's show set in Scotland. Katie Morag's Uncle Matthew lives over on the other side of the island and is a bit of a hermit. Mr McColl goes over to check up on him every now and again, and for the first time ever Katie Morag is allowed to accompany him. She is delighted, because she's been feeling rather grumpy towards her little brother Liam, and also she is curious to see Uncle Matthew.(n)

programme.title: Sarah & Duck
programme.desc: Animation. The Ribbon Sisters invite Sarah and Duck to their favourite seasonal event in the park.(n)

programme.title: Biggleton
programme.desc: Preschool series. It's market day in Biggleton and all of Greengrocer Yusuf's bananas have been eaten! Meanwhile, Bobby the Vet receives an interesting parcel - his banana bugs. Could they be the greedy culprits? Yusuf the Greengrocer, Bobby the Vet and Amelia the Scientist set off after them, but can't find the bugs anywhere. Finally, Amelia the Scientist thinks of a brilliant way to catch the bugs and make sure there are enough bananas left for everyone in Biggleton.(n)

programme.title: Alphablocks
programme.desc: Educational fun. The adventures of 26 lively letters who can make words come to life by holding hands. When T's tip-top new top hat blows away, it's time for some hat chasing to get it back before the big tea party. This episode has fun with '-ap' and the words hat, fan, pet, bat, zap, yap and tap.(n)

programme.title: Yakka Dee
programme.desc: Dee encourages a friend to say 'egg' and we go on a whirlwind word adventure. We see lots of different eggs - a brown egg, a white egg, we even see inside an egg. There's a dippy egg, a fried egg, an egg being laid and what will come out of the hatching egg? There's a gold egg, a cold egg and Dee and her friends even have an egg and spoon race!(n)

He can't wait to have a go himself, but it's much harder to balance than Pando made it look. Bing falls off and bumps his knee, but Pando finds a clever way to help Bing get his confidence back.(n)

programme.title: Twirlywoos
programme.desc: Stop-motion preschool programme about the adventures of four inquisitive Twirlywoos. The Twirlywoos watch a boy tie his shoelace at a bus stop and get the idea to connect his shoelaces to the shoes of the other passengers. When the bus arrives they all stand up, only to fall in a heap!(n)

programme.title: Something Special: We're All Friends
programme.desc: Using a sign language called Makaton, Something Special helps its audience learn how to communicate as well as develop their language in a fun and exciting way. Justin Fletcher presents songs, rhymes and visual humour, all centred around themes that are familiar to young children. Justin travels near and far to meet new friends all over the country. Justin and his friends are making and posting greeting cards, and Mr Tumble is planning a surprise party for Aunt Polly.(n)

programme.title: Teletubbies
programme.desc: Preschool series. When the lights go out in the Home Dome, the Teletubbies get the giggles! The lights come back on again and there is Tubby Custard mess everywhere.(n)

Grown-ups at home are encouraged to take part by hiding baby appropriate shaker or rattle inside a fabric bag or pillowcase for them to reveal and explore with their baby! The fun song 'Dingle Dangle Scarecrow' features, as does a story involving Baby Bear. Plus, the Together Song gets everyone moving about, before some calm time with bubbles and the Goodbye Song.(n)

programme.title: Pablo
programme.desc: Animated preschool series about an autistic boy who uses magic crayons to turn his life challenges into fantastic adventures. Pablo is making funny noises. Noa thinks he might have swallowed something like a telephone or a radio. They realise it's his tummy, but nobody knows what it's trying to say. Kijkwijzer: All ages.(n)

programme.title: My First
programme.desc: Preschool observational documentary series. Join Eiliyah and her grandma as they take their first trip to the seaside. First Eiliyah gets on an old tram that takes her along the seafront where they spot a large tower. Eiliyah and her grandma climb the tower and can see the beach below. They then go on to the beach to build a sandcastle and paddle in the water. As Eiliyah is having such a great time, she sends her mum a postcard telling her about her exciting day. Finally Eiliyah enjoys playing on the pier and ends her trip with an ice cream.(n)

programme.title: Andy's Dinosaur Adventures
programme.desc: Children's dinosaur history series. Andy travels back 127 million years to the time of ornithocheirus - one of the largest flying pterosaurs that ever lived. His mission is to find the skeleton of a sand dollar - a sea creature which spent its life crawling around on the ocean floor. Along the way he encounters a tapejaras, a pterosaur which had a beautiful red crest, before taking to the skies on the back of an ornithocheirus.(n)

programme.title: Swashbuckle
programme.desc: Pirate-themed physical game show. Cook has caught pirate pox. He insists it is harmless and that everybody catches it eventually, but Captain Captain is determined not to catch it and runs away. Later on, Line catches pirate pox too. Captain Captain decides to hide in the cabin to stay away from them, but they keep following her around.(n)

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Animated preschool series. Norrie is sick. Can the Squirrels think of something to cheer her up? Happy suggests a get well soon card!(n)

programme.title: Tinpo
programme.desc: It's taking a Business Po too long to get to work - can Team Tinpo speed up his commute?(n)

programme.title: Bitz & Bob
programme.desc: Animated preschool series introducing children to science and engineering. Bitz and Purl have started the Amazing Owl Club, with its own rulebook, a members-only clubhouse and - best of all - a special badge with flapping owl wings. The badge allows entry to the clubhouse! Bob, Bevel, Zip and Pop manage to join the club by doing three amazingly owly things, but no one can copy Bitz's badge. Bitz needs to reverse-engineer her badge so everyone can see how it works. This enables the others to make their own badges and enter the clubhouse for a big surprise.(n)

programme.title: Junk Rescue
programme.desc: Danny, Zoe and the Junkyard Helpers find a copper jug in the junkyard. Zoe and the Junkyard Helpers make something out of cake tins and there are ideas for how you can transform your junk at home.(n)

programme.title: Catie's Amazing Machines
programme.desc: Preschool series looking at the biggest, fastest and most amazing machines in the world. In this episode, rally driver Catie shows off three amazing off-road machines. She rides a quad bike, shows us an amazing space exploration vehicle and then drives a tank!(n)

programme.title: Peter Rabbit
programme.sub-title: The Tale of the Best Bowler
programme.desc: Animated series. When Peter and Nutkin's pine cone bowling rivalry gets out of hand it leads to big trouble...(n)

programme.title: Go Jetters
programme.desc: Animated adventure comedy series. Grandmaster Glitch's giant ball game threatens El Castillo. Can the Go Jetters bounce back and save it?(n)

programme.title: Gigglebiz
programme.desc: Comedy sketch show for younger viewers. Mischievous King Flannel plays hide-and-seek with Lady Chatalot, intrepid explorer Rapids Johnson demonstrates his camouflage techniques while hunting for bears and newsreader Arthur Sleep finds a fly in his cup of tea.(n)

programme.title: Topsy and Tim
programme.desc: Live-action children's show following the everyday adventures of two fun-loving twins. It's the day Mummy returns home from visiting Grandma Molly. Before picking Mummy up from the train station, Dad helps Topsy and Tim make her a special welcome home surprise for the front of the house.(n)

programme.title: Time for School
programme.desc: Nutsy the toy squirrel comes to school! He's lost his nuts and needs the children's help to find them all. Bailey and his classmates go on a barefoot search for the missing nuts in a swamp. Later, there is lots of fun when they help Nutsy find his woodland friends in a balloon-filled tent. But how many friends will they find?(n)

programme.title: Woolly and Tig
programme.desc: Live-action children's show. Three-year-old Tig and her toy spider Woolly explore new experiences. One cold day, Tig visits the botanic glass house with her mum and dad. Tig is very upset when, on her way home, she discovers she has lost her scarf, hat and gloves. Woolly helps Tig to find what she has lost.(n)

programme.title: Moon and Me
programme.desc: Mr Onion is playing quietly with his toy bridge when he is interrupted by Little Nana and Lambkin, playing a noisy hopping game. In Storyland, they all hop across Mr Onion's bridge together. Everybody enjoys the noisy game!(n)

programme.title: Clangers
programme.desc: Stop-motion animation about a family of mouse-like creatures who live on, and inside, a small moon-like planet. Small and Major Clanger discover a bowl of glow honey that the glowbuzzers have left out in a crater. They take it inside to eat but find some very agitated glowbuzzers, who need them to put it back where they found it for a special visitor.(n)

programme.title: In the Night Garden
programme.desc: In a magical forest, colourful characters have adventures and are read bedtime stories. The Pontipines count to three. First the Tombliboos play hiding, then the Pontipines set off for a walk around the garden. On their way, they meet their next-door neighbours, the Wottingers. Mr and Mrs Pontipine lose the children.(n)

programme.title: CBeebies Bedtime Stories
programme.desc: Matt Berry reads tonight's Bedtime Story all about a busy beaver who finds himself on the wrong side of a falling tree.(n)

programme.title: This Is CBeebies
programme.desc: This is CBeebies. Programmes start at 6.00am.(n)

programme.title: World News Today
programme.desc: The latest news, exploring the day's events from a global perspective.(n)

programme.title: BBC Proms: Pappano and the National Youth Orchestra of the USA
programme.desc: Suzy Klein introduces America's most talented young musicians in an ambitious concert from the National Youth Orchestra of the USA. Sir Antonio Pappano conducts the UK premiere of Benjamin Beckman's new work, Occidentalis and mezzo Joyce DiDonato sings Berlioz's beautifully crafted miniatures Les nuits d'été. The impressive programme culminates with Richard Strauss's epic work, An Alpine Symphony.(n)

programme.title: TOTP 1988
programme.desc: Mike Read and Simon Mayo present the pop chart programme, first broadcast on 12 May 1988 and featuring Harry Enfield, Prince, the Adventures, Narada, Liverpool FC, Belinda Carlisle, Derek B, Prefab Sprout, Star Turn On 45 Pints, Wet Wet Wet, Fairground Attraction and Kylie Minogue.(n)

programme.title: Woodstock - Three Days that Defined a Generation
programme.desc: For three days in August 1969, half a million people from all walks of life converged on a small dairy farm in upstate New York. They came to hear the concert of their lives, but most experienced something far more profound: a moment that came to define a cultural revolution. This documentary tells the story of the lead-up to those three historic days, through the voices of those who were there and the music of the time. It includes extraordinary moments from the concert itself, iconic images of both performers and festival goers, and tells how this groundbreaking event, pulled off right at the last minute, nearly ended in disaster and put the ideals of the counterculture to the test.(n)

programme.title: Stella
programme.desc: Comedy drama series about a Welsh single mother and her family. It's a big day for Stella and Michael and the whole family turn out to celebrate. Rob undergoes life-saving surgery. Nadine faces a big decision.(n)

programme.title: Our Girl
programme.desc: Drama series. An exhausted 2 Section retreat to Kabul only to be ordered to support Elvis in a final mission to capture Omar.(n)

programme.title: Uncle
programme.desc: Comedy series about an irresponsible musician and his neurotic nephew. When Melodie shows up at Andy's flat they finally hash it out and confess their feelings for each other, but things don't turn out as he'd hoped. Meanwhile, in his fantasy writing class Errol spins a fantastical tale of Andy, now cast as a stable boy on a noble quest to find his long lost princess. With the help of Errol in the guise of a young stable master, the boys will encounter a slew of odd but familiar faces in this fantasy retelling of Uncle, possibly helping the real Andy get to the bottom of how he can win Melodie back.(n)

programme.title: DIY SOS: The Big Build
programme.desc: Nick Knowles and the team demolish a cramped bungalow and build an entirely new bespoke five-bedroom home for an inspirational family with complex special needs.(n)

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: The reds and the blues are bargain hunting at Newbury Showground, set in the beautiful Berkshire countryside. Charlie Ross presents, with experts David Harper and John Cameron on hand to help the teams as they go exploring. With just one hour to find three items, it is not just Charlie who has an eye for brown furniture. The auctioneer is Thomas Plant, but will it be the reds or the blues who come out on top at the end of the show?(n)

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Anita Manning presents from Mona Showground on Anglesey with experts Caroline Hawley and Philip Serrell. Two brothers take on a mum and daughter to buy three items that will hopefully make a profit at auction, and they all have their sights on a golden gavel. One team fall in love with a pair of pink flamingos and the other try to find the ugliest items money can buy. Anita uncovers the story of Chester Zoo and gets close up with some penguins.(n)

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Natasha Raskin presents from a huge antiques fair in the heart of the Welsh farming community, the Royal Welsh Showground in Builth Wells. Experts Thomas Plant and Kate Bliss are on hand for the teams. As we head over to Cardiff for the auction, will it be the reds or the blues who come out on top? Natasha meets Peter Cox from the Rhayader Museum and Gallery, who has brought along some interesting farming items to show her. But can she guess what they are?(n)

programme.title: Fawlty Towers
programme.desc: Classic sitcom about a Torquay hotel run by disaster-prone Basil Fawlty and his overbearing wife, Sybil. Havoc ensues when a public health inspector threatens to close the hotel and Manuel introduces his pet 'hamster'.(n)

programme.title: The Musketeers
programme.desc: Historical drama series inspired by the novels of Alexandre Dumas. The Musketeers must risk everything to save France from Rochefort's treacherous plan. While Porthos seeks to lure the Spanish spymaster to Paris to prove Rochefort's betrayal to the King, Athos and d'Artagnan must save Constance from certain death. However will they be able to protect Aramis and the Queen before Rochefort gets to them first? The fate of France and their closest comrades lies in the Musketeers' hands.(n)

programme.title: Dickensian
programme.desc: Drama series set within the world of Charles Dickens's novels. Already facing financial ruin, Edward Barbary finds his situation deteriorating when Scrooge demands his loan is repaid. Devastated by the loss of Jip, Amelia is surprised when Compeyson arrives with a present and a declaration.(n)

programme.title: EastEnders
programme.desc: Tiffany is left reeling from the consequences of Jack's recent actions, Phil makes a drastic decision about his family's future, and Shirley contemplates a recent offer.(n)

programme.title: Hustle
programme.desc: Drama series about a group of con artists. Mickey implements an unorthodox con to target two sham health product salesmen, Dean and Dana Deville. They are going to sell the Devilles a fake diet treatment, but two heists, a long convincer and a lot of weight loss make for a risky endeavour. Perhaps this time the grifters really have gone too far? Meanwhile Eddie finds love.(n)

programme.title: DIY SOS: The Big Build
programme.desc: Kidney failure has meant that midwife Sascha has to endure intensive dialysis at hospital just to stay alive. This intense dialysis for hours on end, five days a week, places her body under immense stress with the constant threat of life-risking blood clots. If this continues, Sascha, a mother to four children, has a life expectancy of just a few years. However, Sascha could do self-dialysis daily from her home, and the increase in frequency and the decrease in intensity would mean her life expectancy and lifestyle would improve dramatically. So that is where DIY SOS and the generous volunteers and trades of Billy's home turf, Welwyn Garden City, step up to help one of their own. In an emotionally charged episode, Sascha's family home is completely renovated and extended to include a dedicated home-dialysis room for Sascha, which offers her a lifeline and extra years with her loving family.(n)

programme.title: Casualty
programme.desc: Connie takes the opportunity to prove herself, but it ends in disaster. Duffy proves her worth in the ED but gets caught up in Connie's mistake, and after a tough day, Iain plucks up the courage to talk about how he's feeling and realises just how far he's come.(n)

programme.title: Hitler On Trial
programme.desc: A fascinating look at the Jewish lawyer who tried to bring down the Nazi party in 1931. Hans Litten dared to put Hitler in the dock but later paid heavily for exposing his violent campaigns.(n)

programme.title: W1A
programme.desc: Comedy. programme.title: Noces rouges
programme.desc: Terwijl hij 's nachts op zijn scooter rijdt, wordt de jonge Simon Tambarini, 15 jaar, vol door een auto geraakt. Vier jaar later gaan zijn ouders en zijn broer Vincent naar het huwelijk van Sandra en William. Tijdens het huwelijk komt Alice binnenvallen, de zus van Sandra en voormalige verloofde van Vincent, die de streek een paar jaar eerder verliet. Deze terugkeer is onverwacht en bevalt niet iedereen maar de bruid is erg blij. Iets later, terwijl William zijn echtgenote zoekt, ziet Alice het lijk van haar zus onder aan een klif. Zelfmoord wordt al snel verworpen en Anthony Pasquali, een werknemer in het restaurant van Claire, de moeder van Alice en Sandra, wordt als verdachte beschouwd. Vincent wordt met het onderzoek belast. Nederlands ondertiteld.(n)

programme.title: Noces rouges
programme.desc: Als Vincent de mobiele telefoon van Anthony Pasquali zoekt, verrast hij Alice, die niet anders kan dan hem te vertellen over de video met Anthony en haar zus. Claire ontmoet Fabio, die zij verwijt de overeenkomst niet te zijn nagekomen die ze na de dood van Simon zijn aangegaan. Terwijl deze laatste de belangrijkste verdachte wordt, wordt zijn lijk gevonden: hij zou op de dag van het huwelijk geslagen en in het water gegooid zijn. Nederlands ondertiteld.(n)

Spontaan nodigt hij haar en haar gezin uit om een paar dagen met hun mee te gaan op vakantie. Nederlands ondertiteld.(n)

programme.title: Les secrets
programme.desc: Sarah zet haar zoektocht naar de waarheid voort. Wie is deze Inès? Hoe lang waren zij en Alex al minnaars? Terwijl Sarah in de familie van de man haar onderzoek voortzet, ontdekt ze andere liefdesbrieven van Inès. Brieven die aanwijzingen bevatten waardoor ze eindelijk de jonge vrouw kan identificeren. Ze heet Inès Paoli. En ze blijkt twintig jaar eerder in een aangestoken brand om het leven te zijn gekomen, samen met haar hele familie. Het mysterie wordt steeds groter. Nederlands ondertiteld.(n)

programme.title: Les secrets
programme.desc: Paul is verdwenen. Weggelopen? Ontvoerd? Het lichaam van Justine wordt gevonden: ze is hard op haar hoofd geslagen. Wat wist ze? Sarah krijgt bericht van de ontvoerders: Paul is inderdaad ontvoerd, hij zal worden vrijgelaten als ze het onderzoek opgeeft en teruggaat naar Parijs. Het lijkt steeds duidelijker dat de recente gebeurtenissen en de dood van Alex verband houden met de brand waarin de familie Paoli omkwam. Nederlands ondertiteld.(n)

programme.title: Selma
programme.desc: In 1965, ruim een eeuw na de Amerikaanse Burgeroorlog, barsten in de staat Alabama diverse protesten los. De Afro-Amerikaanse bevolking eist stemrecht voor minderheden in Amerika. De spanningen lopen hoger op na de dood van een jonge Afro-Amerikaan en de arrestatie van de Afro-Amerikaanse Annie Lee Cooper en explodeert wanneer de protestmars van het stadje Selma naar de hoofdstad Montgomery eindigt met bruut geweld en de boeken ingaat als Bloody Sunday. Ze laten het er echter niet bij zitten. Onder leiding van Martin Luther King, Jr. ontstaat een van de grootste protestmarsen ooit. Een paar maanden later introduceert de president een nieuwe wet, waarin gelijkheid van stemrecht wordt vastgelegd.
